Uses of Interface
org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling.VmScaling

  • Packages that use VmScaling 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms
    Provides implementations of Virtual Machines (Vm) which are a software package that emulate the architecture of a physical machine.
    org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling  

    • Uses of VmScaling in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms that return VmScaling 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VmScaling VmSimple.getHorizontalScaling() 
      VmScaling Vm.getHorizontalScaling()
      Gets the HorizontalVmScaling that will check if the Vm is overloaded, based on some conditions defined by a Predicate given to the HorizontalVmScaling.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms with parameters of type VmScaling 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vm VmSimple.setHorizontalScaling(VmScaling horizontalScaling) 
      Vm Vm.setHorizontalScaling(VmScaling horizontalScaling)
      Sets the HorizontalVmScaling that will check if the Vm is overloaded, based on some conditions defined by a Predicate given to the HorizontalVmScaling.

    • Uses of VmScaling in org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling

      Subinterfaces of VmScaling in org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  HorizontalVmScaling
      A Vm Horizontal Scaling mechanism used by a DatacenterBroker to dynamically create or destroy VMs according to the arrival or termination of Cloudlets, in order to enable load balancing.
      Classes in org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling that implement VmScaling 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HorizontalVmScalingSimple
      A HorizontalVmScaling implementation that allows defining that the VMs from a given DatacenterBroker are overloaded or not based on the overall resource utilization of all such VMs.
      Fields in org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling declared as VmScaling 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static VmScaling VmScaling.NULL
      An attribute that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for HorizontalVmScaling objects.
      Methods in org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling that return VmScaling 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VmScaling VmScaling.setVm(Vm vm)
      Sets a Vm to this Load Balancer.
      VmScaling HorizontalVmScalingSimple.setVm(Vm vm) 
      VmScaling HorizontalVmScalingSimple.setVmSupplier(Supplier<Vm> supplier) 
      VmScaling HorizontalVmScaling.setVmSupplier(Supplier<Vm> supplier)
      Sets a Supplier that will be used to create VMs when the Load Balancer detects that the Broker's VMs are overloaded.
